column4: hi, there.  anyone care to help with an install problem?  running AMD 64 x2, live CD works, install to hdd,  boots fine, but hangs after "setting up console and keymap".  Is this where the X server kicks in and could be to blame?
read about having to re-compile the kernel for SMP support, acpi=off, and usb conflicts.  nothing has helped...[sigh]
yeah, I thought ubuntu "just works"...not so much...
same could be said for windows. :)
